events.message: I received my order last week, but unfortunately I want to return the item and get a refund because it doesn't meet my expectations.
The system identified this case as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning return and refund.
Your case has been assigned to one of our customer service agents who will assist you with the refund process shortly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. Iâ€™m here to help you with your return and refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund, could you also let us know the reason for the return and if the item is unopened or used?
My order number is 123456789, and I want to return the product because it does not function as described. The package is unopened.
We will initiate your refund as soon as you send the unopened item back to us using the prepaid return label we will provide.
Thank you, I appreciate the quick response and the prepaid return label offer to make the process easier.
Your refund case is now open and the prepaid return label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the item, we will complete the refund promptly.
We are following up to ensure you received the return label and to check if you need any additional assistance with your refund.
Your refund has been processed and the case is now closed. Thank you for shopping with us and please contact us again if needed.
